description:
Two bothers exchange jobs, a kappa waits 14 years, and 3 souls get a 2nd chance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Umisachihiko and Yamasachihiko / The Day the Kappa Came / King Enma Screws Up
Umisachihiko to Yamasachihiko / Kappa ga Detekita Hi / Enma-sama no Shippai
海幸彦と山幸彦 / 河童が出てきた日 / 閻魔さまの失敗
